attributes.additional_details:
This man is losing the battle with RBS,  2 billion now lost, There should be a vote put to the public who own 82% of this company as to wheather he should go or not.
He has done a terrible job, yet the govenment are saying what a geat job he is doing, are they blind.
This guy will cost us dearly
& now they are giving themselves yet another big bonus, most people on low incomes, on min wage have never had a bonus for all there good work and yet the govenment esp Dave & George think this is great news.
Not got a clue.
